      8 #include "src/codesearch.h"
      9 #include "src/chunk.h"
     10 #include "src/chunk_allocator.h"
     11 #include "src/content.h"
     12 #include "src/dump_load.h"
     13 #include "src/lib/debug.h"

     15 #include <map>
     16 #include <string>
     17 #include <memory>
     18 
     19 #include <sys/fcntl.h>
     20 #include <sys/mman.h>
     21 #include <sys/stat.h>
     22 #include <unistd.h>
     23 #include <errno.h>
     24 #include <string.h>
     25 
     26 #include "google/protobuf/util/json_util.h"

     28 #include "gflags/gflags.h"
     29 
     30 DEFINE_bool(eager_memory_load, false, "Eagerly load memory-mapped index file pages into virtual memory (Linux only)");
     31 
     32 class codesearch_index {
     33 public:
     34     codesearch_index(code_searcher *cs, string path) :
     35         cs_(cs),
     36         stream_(path.c_str(), ios::out | ios::trunc),
     37         hdr_() {
     38         assert(!stream_.fail());
     39         fd_ = open(path.c_str(), O_RDWR|O_APPEND);
     40         if (fd_ == -1) {
     41             string message = "Cannot open " + path;
     42             perror(message.c_str());
     43             exit(1);
     44         }
     45 
     46         hdr_.magic      = kIndexMagic;
     47         hdr_.version    = kIndexVersion;
     48         hdr_.chunk_size = cs->alloc_->chunk_size();
     49     }
     50 
     51     ~codesearch_index() {
     52         close(fd_);
     53     }
     54 
     55     void dump();
     56 protected:
     57     void dump_chunk_data();
     58     void dump_metadata();
     59     void dump_file(map<const indexed_tree*, int>& ids, indexed_file *sf);
     60     void dump_chunk_file(chunk_file *cf);
     61     void dump_chunk_files(chunk *, chunk_header *);
     62     void dump_chunk_data(chunk *);
     63     void dump_content_data();
     64     void dump_filename_index();
     65 
     66     void alignp(uint32_t align) {
     67         streampos pos = stream_.tellp();
     68         stream_.seekp((size_t(pos) + align - 1) & ~(align - 1));
     69     }
     70 
     71     template<class T>
     72     void dump(T *t) {
     73         stream_.write(reinterpret_cast<char*>(t), sizeof *t);
     74     }
     75 
     76     void dump_int32(uint32_t i) {
     77         dump(&i);
     78     }
     79 
     80     void dump_string(const string &str) {
     81         dump_int32(str.size());
     82         stream_.write(str.c_str(), str.size());
     83     }
     84 
     85     code_searcher *cs_;
     86     std::fstream stream_;
     87     int fd_;
     88 
     89     uint8_t *map_;
     90     uint8_t *p_;
     91 
     92     index_header hdr_;
     93     vector<chunk_header> chunks_;
     94     vector<content_chunk_header> content_;
     95 
     96     friend class dump_allocator;
     97 };
     98 
     99 class dump_allocator : public chunk_allocator {
    100 private:
    101     pair<off_t, uint8_t *> alloc_mmap(size_t len) {
    102         void *buf;
    103 
    104         if (!index_.get()) {
    105             index_.reset(new codesearch_index(cs_, path_.c_str()));
    106             index_->dump(&index_->hdr_);
    107             index_->alignp(kPageSize);
    108         }
    109 
    110         off_t off = index_->stream_.tellp();
    111         int err = ftruncate(index_->fd_, off + len);
    112         if (err != 0) {
    113             die("ftruncate");
    114         }
    115         buf = mmap(NULL, len, PROT_READ|PROT_WRITE, MAP_SHARED,
    116                    index_->fd_, off);
    117         if (buf == MAP_FAILED) {
    118             die("mmap %s: %s", path_.c_str(), strerror((errno)));
    119         }
    120         index_->stream_.seekp(len, ios::cur);
    121         return make_pair(off, static_cast<uint8_t*>(buf));
    122     }
    123 
    124 public:
    125     dump_allocator(code_searcher *cs, const char *path)
    126         : cs_(cs), path_(path), index_() {
    127     }
    128 
    129     virtual chunk *alloc_chunk() {
    130         auto alloc = alloc_mmap((1 + sizeof(uint32_t)) * chunk_size_);
    131 
    132         chunk_header chdr = {
    133             uint64_t(alloc.first)
    134         };
    135         index_->chunks_.push_back(chdr);
    136 
    137         return new chunk(static_cast<unsigned char*>(alloc.second),
    138                          reinterpret_cast<uint32_t*>
    139                          (static_cast<unsigned char*>(alloc.second) + chunk_size_));
    140     }
    141 
    142     virtual buffer alloc_content_chunk() {
    143         auto alloc = alloc_mmap(kContentChunkSize);
    144         buffer b = {
    145             alloc.second, alloc.second + kContentChunkSize
    146         };
    147         content_chunk_header hdr = {
    148             uint64_t(alloc.first)
    149             /* .size will be calculated in finalize */
    150         };
    151         index_->content_.push_back(hdr);
    152         return b;
    153     }
    154 
    155     virtual void finalize() {
    156         chunk_allocator::finalize();
    157         auto cit = index_->content_.begin();
    158         for (auto ait = begin_content();
    159              ait != end_content(); ++ait, ++cit) {
    160             cit->size = ait->end - ait->data;
    161         }
    162         index_->dump_metadata();
    163         index_->dump_filename_index();
    164         index_->stream_.seekp(0);
    165         index_->dump(&index_->hdr_);
    166         index_->stream_.close();
    167     }
    168 
    169     virtual void free_chunk(chunk *chunk) {
    170         munmap(chunk->data, 5*chunk_size_);
    171         delete chunk;
    172     }
    173 protected:
    174     code_searcher *cs_;
    175     std::string path_;
    176     unique_ptr<codesearch_index> index_;
    177     map<void *, off_t> alloc_map_;
    178     vector<off_t> content_;
    179 
    180 };
    181 
    182 class load_allocator : public chunk_allocator {
    183 public:
    184     load_allocator(code_searcher *cs, const string& path);
    185 
    186     ~load_allocator() {
    187         close(fd_);
    188         munmap(map_, map_size_);
    189     }
    190 
    191     virtual chunk *alloc_chunk();
    192     virtual buffer alloc_content_chunk() {
    193         die("load_allocator::alloc_content_chunk");
    194     }
    195 
    196     virtual void free_chunk(chunk *chunk) {
    197         delete chunk;
    198     }
    199 
    200     virtual void drop_caches() {
    201         for (auto it = begin(); it != end(); ++it) {
    202             madvise((*it)->data, (*it)->size, MADV_DONTNEED);
    203             madvise((*it)->suffixes, (*it)->size * sizeof(*(*it)->suffixes), MADV_DONTNEED);
    204         }
    205 #ifdef POSIX_FADV_DONTNEED
    206         posix_fadvise(fd_, hdr_->chunks_off,
    207                       chunks_.size() * chunk_size_ * (1 + sizeof(uint32_t)),
    208                       POSIX_FADV_DONTNEED);
    209 #endif
    210     }
    211 
    212     void load(code_searcher *cs);
    213 protected:
    214     template <class T>
    215     T *consume() {
    216         T *out = reinterpret_cast<T*>(p_);
    217         p_ += sizeof(T);
    218         return out;
    219     }
    220 
    221     template <class T>
    222     T *ptr(uint64_t off) {
    223         assert(off < map_size_);
    224         return reinterpret_cast<T*>(static_cast<uint8_t*>(map_) + off);
    225     }
    226 
    227     void seekg(off_t off) {
    228         p_ = static_cast<uint8_t*>(map_) + off;
    229     }
    230 
    231     std::unique_ptr<indexed_file> load_file(code_searcher *cs);
    232     void load_chunk(code_searcher *);
    233 
    234     uint32_t load_int32() {
    235         return *(consume<uint32_t>());
    236     }
    237 
    238     string load_string() {
    239         uint32_t len = load_int32();
    240         uint8_t *buf = p_;
    241         p_ += len;
    242         return string(reinterpret_cast<char*>(buf), len);
    243     }
    244 
    245     int fd_;
    246     void *map_;
    247     size_t map_size_;
    248     uint8_t *p_;
    249 
    250     index_header *hdr_;
    251     chunk_header *chunks_hdr_;
    252     chunk_header *next_chunk_;
    253 };
    254 
    255 std::unique_ptr<chunk_allocator> make_dump_allocator(code_searcher *search, const string& path) {
    256     return std::make_unique<dump_allocator>(search, path.c_str());
    257 }
    258 
    259 void codesearch_index::dump_file(map<const indexed_tree*, int>& ids, indexed_file *sf) {
    260     dump_int32(ids[sf->tree]);
    261     dump_string(sf->path);
    262 }
    263 
    264 void codesearch_index::dump_chunk_file(chunk_file *cf) {
    265     dump_int32(cf->files.size());
    266     for (list<indexed_file*>::iterator it = cf->files.begin();
    267          it != cf->files.end(); ++it)
    268         dump_int32((*it)->no);
    269 
    270     dump_int32(cf->left);
    271     dump_int32(cf->right);
    272 }
    273 
    274 void codesearch_index::dump_chunk_files(chunk *chunk, chunk_header *hdr) {
    275     hdr->files_off = stream_.tellp();
    276     hdr->nfiles = chunk->files.size();
    277     hdr->size = chunk->size;
    278 
    279     for (vector<chunk_file>::iterator it = chunk->files.begin();
    280          it != chunk->files.end(); it ++)
    281         dump_chunk_file(&(*it));
    282 }
    283 
    284 void codesearch_index::dump_chunk_data(chunk *chunk) {
    285     alignp(kPageSize);
    286     size_t off = stream_.tellp();
    287 
    288     chunk_header chdr;
    289     chdr.data_off = off;
    290     chdr.size = chunk->size;
    291     chunks_.push_back(chdr);
    292 
    293     int err = ftruncate(fd_, off + 5 * hdr_.chunk_size);
    294     if (err != 0) {
    295         die("ftruncate");
    296     }
    297     stream_.write(reinterpret_cast<char*>(chunk->data), hdr_.chunk_size);
    298     stream_.write(reinterpret_cast<char*>(chunk->suffixes),
    299                   sizeof(uint32_t) * chunk->size);
    300     stream_.seekp(off + 5 * hdr_.chunk_size);
    301 }
    302 
    303 void codesearch_index::dump_metadata() {
    304     hdr_.ntrees   = cs_->trees_.size();
    305     hdr_.nfiles   = cs_->files_.size();
    306     hdr_.nchunks  = cs_->alloc_->size();
    307     hdr_.ncontent = content_.size();
    308     hdr_.timestamp = cs_->index_timestamp();
    309 
    310     hdr_.name_off = stream_.tellp();
    311     dump_string(cs_->name());
    312 
    313     map<const indexed_tree*, int> tree_ids;
    314 
    315     hdr_.refs_off = stream_.tellp();
    316     for (auto it = cs_->trees_.begin();
    317          it != cs_->trees_.end(); ++it) {
    318         dump_string((*it)->name);
    319         dump_string((*it)->version);
    320         string metadata;
    321         auto st = google::protobuf::util::MessageToJsonString((*it)->metadata, &metadata);
    322         if (!st.ok()) {
    323             die("protobuf: %s", st.ToString().c_str());
    324         }
    325         dump_string(metadata);
    326         tree_ids[it->get()] = it - cs_->trees_.begin();
    327     }
    328     hdr_.files_off = stream_.tellp();
    329     for (auto it = cs_->files_.begin();
    330          it != cs_->files_.end(); ++it)
    331         dump_file(tree_ids, it->get());
    332 
    333     auto hdr = chunks_.begin();
    334     for (auto it = cs_->alloc_->begin();
    335          it != cs_->alloc_->end(); ++it, ++hdr) {
    336         assert(hdr != chunks_.end());
    337         dump_chunk_files(*it, &(*hdr));
    338     }
    339 
    340     hdr_.chunks_off = stream_.tellp();
    341     for (auto it = chunks_.begin(); it != chunks_.end(); ++it)
    342         dump(&*it);
    343 
    344     hdr_.content_off = stream_.tellp();
    345     for (auto it = content_.begin(); it != content_.end(); ++it)
    346         dump(&*it);
    347 }
    348 
    349 void codesearch_index::dump_chunk_data() {
    350     alignp(kPageSize);
    351     for (auto it = cs_->alloc_->begin();
    352          it != cs_->alloc_->end(); ++it) {
    353         dump_chunk_data(*it);
    354     }
    355 }
    356 
    357 void codesearch_index::dump_content_data() {
    358     alignp(kPageSize);
    359     for (auto it = cs_->alloc_->begin_content();
    360          it != cs_->alloc_->end_content(); ++it) {
    361         off_t off = stream_.tellp();
    362         stream_.write(reinterpret_cast<char*>(it->data), it->end - it->data);
    363         content_.push_back((content_chunk_header) {
    364                 uint64_t(off),
    365                 uint32_t(it->end - it->data)
    366             });
    367     }
    368 }
    369 
    370 void codesearch_index::dump_filename_index() {
    371     hdr_.nfiledata = cs_->filename_data_.size();
    372 
    373     hdr_.filedata_off = stream_.tellp();
    374     for (auto it = cs_->filename_data_.begin();
    375          it != cs_->filename_data_.end(); ++it) {
    376         dump(&*it);
    377     }
    378 
    379     hdr_.filesuffixes_off = stream_.tellp();
    380     for (auto it = cs_->filename_suffixes_.begin();
    381          it != cs_->filename_suffixes_.end(); ++it) {
    382         dump_int32(*it);
    383     }
    384 
    385     hdr_.filepos_off = stream_.tellp();
    386     for (auto it = cs_->filename_positions_.begin();
    387          it != cs_->filename_positions_.end(); ++it) {
    388         dump(&it->first);
    389         // The indexed_file associated with this filename position is already
    390         // populated into the dump file via dump_metadata at this point; it need
    391         // not be re-written.
    392     }
    393 }
    394 
    395 void codesearch_index::dump() {
    396     assert(cs_->finalized_);
    397 
    398     dump(&hdr_);
    399 
    400     dump_chunk_data();
    401     dump_content_data();
    402     dump_metadata();
    403     dump_filename_index();
    404 
    405     stream_.seekp(0);
    406     dump(&hdr_);
    407 }
    408 
    409 load_allocator::load_allocator(code_searcher *cs, const string& path) {
    410     fd_ = open(path.c_str(), O_RDONLY);
    411     if (fd_ == -1) {
    412         string message = "Cannot open " + path;
    413         perror(message.c_str());
    414         exit(1);
    415     }
    416     struct stat st;
    417     int err = fstat(fd_, &st);
    418     if (err != 0) {
    419         die("Cannot stat: '%s': %s\n", path.c_str(), strerror(errno));
    420     }
    421     map_size_ = st.st_size;
    422     int flags = MAP_PRIVATE;
    423     if (FLAGS_eager_memory_load) {
    424 #if defined(MAP_POPULATE)
    425         flags |= MAP_POPULATE;
    426 #else
    427         fprintf(stderr, "Error: eager memory load is not supported on this platform\n");
    428         exit(1);
    429 #endif
    430     }
    431     map_ = mmap(NULL, map_size_, PROT_READ, flags,
    432                 fd_, 0);
    433     if (map_ == MAP_FAILED) {
    434         die("mmap %s: %s", path.c_str(), strerror((errno)));
    435     }
    436     p_ = static_cast<unsigned char*>(map_);
    437 
    438     hdr_ = consume<index_header>();
    439     set_chunk_size(hdr_->chunk_size);
    440     chunks_hdr_ = next_chunk_ = ptr<chunk_header>(hdr_->chunks_off);
    441     cs->set_index_timestamp((int64_t) hdr_->timestamp);
    442 
    443     p_ = ptr<unsigned char>(hdr_->name_off);
    444     cs->set_name(load_string());
    445 }
    446 
    447 
    448 chunk *load_allocator::alloc_chunk() {
    449     unsigned char *data = ptr<unsigned char>(next_chunk_->data_off);
    450     uint32_t *indexes = reinterpret_cast<uint32_t*>(data + chunk_size_);
    451 
    452     return new chunk(data, indexes);
    453 }
    454 
    455 unique_ptr<indexed_file> load_allocator::load_file(code_searcher *cs) {
    456     auto sf = std::make_unique<indexed_file>();
    457     sf->tree = cs->trees_[load_int32()].get();
    458     sf->path = load_string();
    459     sf->no = cs->files_.size();
    460     return sf;
    461 }
    462 
    463 void load_allocator::load_chunk(code_searcher *cs) {
    464     skip_chunk();
    465     chunk* chunk = current_chunk();
    466 
    467     assert(next_chunk_->size <= hdr_->chunk_size);
    468     chunk->size = next_chunk_->size;
    469 
    470     p_ = ptr<unsigned char>(next_chunk_->files_off);
    471 
    472     for (int i = 0; i < next_chunk_->nfiles; i++) {
    473         chunk->files.push_back(chunk_file());
    474         chunk_file &cf = chunk->files.back();
    475         uint32_t nfiles = load_int32();
    476         for (int j = 0; j < nfiles; j++)
    477             cf.files.push_back(cs->files_[load_int32()].get());
    478         cf.left  = load_int32();
    479         cf.right = load_int32();
    480     }
    481     chunk->build_tree_names();
    482     chunk->build_tree();
    483     ++next_chunk_;
    484 }
    485 
    486 void load_allocator::load(code_searcher *cs) {
    487     assert(!cs->finalized_);
    488     assert(!cs->trees_.size());
    489 
    490     if (hdr_->magic != kIndexMagic) {
    491         die("file has invalid magic: got %x != %x", hdr_->magic, kIndexMagic);
    492     }
    493     if (hdr_->version != kIndexVersion) {
    494         die("file has unsupported version: got %d != %d. "
    495             "Index may have been created by an incompatible livegrep version",
    496             hdr_->version, kIndexVersion);
    497     }
    498     assert(hdr_->chunks_off);
    499 
    500     set_chunk_size(hdr_->chunk_size);
    501 
    502     p_ = ptr<uint8_t>(hdr_->refs_off);
    503     for (int i = 0; i < hdr_->ntrees; i++) {
    504         auto tree = std::make_unique<indexed_tree>();
    505         tree->name = load_string();
    506         tree->version = load_string();
    507         string metadata = load_string();
    508         if (metadata.size() != 0) {
    509             auto status = google::protobuf::util::JsonStringToMessage(metadata, &tree->metadata, google::protobuf::util::JsonParseOptions());
    510             if (!status.ok()) {
    511                 die("parse metadata: %s", status.ToString().c_str());
    512             }
    513         }
    514 
    515         cs->trees_.push_back(move(tree));
    516     }
    517 
    518     p_ = ptr<uint8_t>(hdr_->files_off);
    519     for (int i = 0; i < hdr_->nfiles; i++) {
    520         cs->files_.push_back(load_file(cs));
    521     }
    522 
    523     assert(!current_);
    524     for (int i = 0; i < hdr_->nchunks; i++) {
    525         load_chunk(cs);
    526     }
    527 
    528     content_chunk_header *chdr = ptr<content_chunk_header>(hdr_->content_off);
    529     auto it = cs->files_.begin();
    530     for (int i = 0; i < hdr_->ncontent; i++) {
    531         buffer b;
    532         p_ = ptr<uint8_t>(chdr->file_off);
    533         b.data = p_;
    534         while (p_ < ptr<uint8_t>(chdr->file_off + chdr->size)) {
    535             (*it)->content = new(p_) file_contents;
    536             p_ = reinterpret_cast<uint8_t*>((*it)->content->end());
    537             ++it;
    538         }
    539         b.end = p_;
    540         content_chunks_.push_back(b);
    541         ++chdr;
    542     }
    543     assert(it == cs->files_.end());
    544 
    545     p_ = ptr<uint8_t>(hdr_->filedata_off);
    546     cs->filename_data_.reserve(hdr_->nfiledata);
    547     for (int i = 0; i < hdr_->nfiledata; i++) {
    548         cs->filename_data_.push_back(*consume<unsigned char>());
    549     }
    550 
    551     p_ = ptr<uint8_t>(hdr_->filesuffixes_off);
    552     cs->filename_suffixes_.reserve(hdr_->nfiledata);
    553     for (int i = 0; i < hdr_->nfiledata; i++) {
    554         cs->filename_suffixes_.push_back(load_int32());
    555     }
    556 
    557     p_ = ptr<uint8_t>(hdr_->filepos_off);
    558     cs->filename_positions_.reserve(hdr_->nfiles);
    559     for (auto it = cs->files_.begin();
    560          it != cs->files_.end(); ++it) {
    561         int pos = *consume<int>();
    562         indexed_file *sf = it->get();
    563         cs->filename_positions_.push_back(make_pair(pos, sf));
    564     }
    565 
    566     cs->finalized_ = true;
    567 }
    568 
    569 void code_searcher::dump_index(const string &path) {
    570     codesearch_index idx(this, path);
    571     idx.dump();
    572 }
    573 
    574 void code_searcher::load_index(const string &path) {
    575     std::unique_ptr<load_allocator> alloc = std::make_unique<load_allocator>(this, path);
    576     set_alloc(move(alloc));
    577     dynamic_cast<load_allocator*>(alloc_.get())->load(this);
    578 }
